item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, my name is Markus Schmidinger. I’m a Freelance Polyglot Software Engineer with a focus in the Web Area. The last years i spent a lot of time with Backend Development with Golang and the Cloud Native Stack. I also have experience developing Embedded Systems using C++/Qt and the Yocto Buildsystem. My current focus is on functional languages for Web Development like Elixir and Elm. If you are interested to collaborate with me, feel free to contact me.
